title: Style: Forty Ounce Clothing Summer Range
body:
London based street wear label, [**Forty Ounce Clothing**](http://fortyounce.co.uk/index.html), have just released a subtly homoerotic promotional video for their stunning new summer range. Apart from featuring some bros doing some mildly homoerotic shit, (smiling, looking happy, gently frolicking), it also features the new Tees on offer. Check out the video below, and bare in mind that the clothing is probably never going to look as good on you.

The video also features a track from CITR bro **UNOUOMEDUDE**, a cover of the **Coma Cinema** track, ‘Her Sinking Sun’.

Buy some threads **[HERE](http://fortyounce.bigcartel.com/)**

[Forty Ounce Clothing](http://vimeo.com/26942191) from [FORTYOUNCE CLOTHING](http://vimeo.com/user4875143) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
